title: Withdrawal - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Drama CD   Artists   Childhood Friends   Clingy Lover   Cold Love Interests   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Familial Love   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Proactive Protagonist   Programmer   Tsundere
author: 十一月十四
description:
A spoiled brat is here to seduce his man! Childhood friends to lovers.

When Fu Shizhou was seven years old, he gained a little tail named Qiao Luo. If he were to get it removed, severe withdrawal symptoms would ensue.

Qiao Luo was born with the innate ability to tease and be spoiled.

Zhouzhou wasn’t born awkward; that developed later in life. His maturity is a lasting aftereffect of his chuuni years. He’s actually a top-tier cinnamon roll.>
